title: Functions and Object-Oriented Programming
description: Learn to write reusable code with functions and understand classes and objects
objectives: Students can write and call functions with parameters and return values
Students understand the basics of object-oriented programming
Students can create simple classes with methods and attributes

content.title: Functions in Python
content.body: Functions are reusable blocks of code that perform specific tasks. They help organize code, avoid repetition, and make programs more modular. Functions can accept parameters and return values.

content.title: Creating Your First Functions
content.transcript: Functions are one of the most important concepts in programming. Let's start by defining a simple function...

summary: Functions help organize code into reusable blocks. Classes and objects allow us to model real-world entities and their behaviors, forming the foundation of object-oriented programming.
